thread.title: Nacho - I'm sure we're on up again
thread.title_full: Nacho - I'm sure we're on up again

title: Nacho - I'm sure we're on up again
text:
× Nacho - I'm sure we're on up again 
Nacho Monreal has experienced both highs and the lows since making the switch to north London in January 2013. 
Despite a strong start to the current campaign for both player and club - one in which he earned a recall to the Spain squad - recent results have been difficult, although he remains confident of a strong finish to the season. The rise of Nacho Monreal 
“We have had difficult games, but maybe our commitment hasn’t been enough [lately],” Monreal told Arsenal Player . 
“In the past few games we haven’t played our game and maybe that’s why we’ve lost too many times. 
“When you lose one, two or three games in a short time, it’s obviously difficult because your confidence goes down. 
“We have to win a couple of games and then I’m completely sure that the team will go up again.” Copyright 2017 The Arsenal Football Club plc. Permission to use quotations from this article is granted subject to appropriate credit being given to www.arsenal.com as the source 17 Mar 2017
